title: Raees
writer: Rahul Dholakia, Harit Mehta, Niraj Shukla
short_cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Mahira Khan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub, Sheeba Chaddha, Shubham Chintamani, Shubham Tukaram, Atul Kulkarni, Narendra Jha, Jaideep Ahlawat, Sunny Leone
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Mahira Khan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub, Sheeba Chaddha, Shubham Chintamani, Shubham Tukaram, Atul Kulkarni, Narendra Jha, Jaideep Ahlawat, Sunny Leone
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Crime Movies, Action & Adventure, Dramas
desc: After street smart kid Raees rises to become Gujarat's bootlegging king in the 1980s, he tries to balance his life of crime with helping his people.
